title: Pianist in the Shopping District
overview: This drama revolves around a street piano that is located in a music store at a shopping district. Sawamoto Ren is a young electrician who once turned away from the piano but upon meeting the daughter of the music store owner Kajiwara Midori, decides to embark on a new path as a street piano performer. As a result, Ren and Midori meet and interact with various people from all walks of life.
